readable.title: 2182050469_1edac0bc60
readable.content: A person crouches at the end of a dock on a lake . A person is squatting at the end of a pier near a lake . A person with a red backpack squatting at the end of a dock . a single person squated down at the edge of a pier overlooking a lake I am squatting on a dock , looking into a lake .
